Juicy Fest: Rival bites gang-member’s ear in scuffle at North Harbour Stadium hip-hop festival https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/juicy-fest-rival-bites-gang-members-ear-in-scuffle-at-north-harbour-stadium-hip-hop-festival/46YEWOMMMNEQZLUBH3FKXHFPGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/juicy-fest-rival-bites-gang-members-ear-in-scuffle-at-north-harbour-stadium-hip-hop-festival/46YEWOMMMNEQZLUBH3FKXHFPGI/Police confirm man received medical treatment for 'injuries to ear'. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:14:36 +0000 A police officer was hit with a bottle and there were scenes of intoxication, disorder and assault involving people - including suspected gang members - outside the Juicy Fest music festival in Wellington.
Hawke’s Bay: Hercules collects Air Force sergeant turned Anglican bishop Richard Wallace for soaring send-off https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-hercules-collects-air-force-sergeant-turned-anglican-bishop-richard-wallace-for-soaring-send-关/MJMCB6MSVFGPPB5GA6HZNNRRMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-hercules-collects-air-force-sergeant-turned-anglican-bishop-richard-wallace-for-soaring-send-关/MJMCB6MSVFGPPB5GA6HZNNRRMU/ Richard Wallace, QSM, died in Wairoa on Saturday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:05:57 +0000 The body of Bishop of Te Waipounamu Richard Wallace is loaded into an air force Hercules at Hawke's Bay Airport on Monday. Photo / Warren Buckland

Special load: Washing basket kittens saved from dump as SPCA voices desexing plea https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/special-load-washing-basket-kittens-saved-from-dump-as-spca-voices-desexing-plea/ZETAY2WUVREGJO53BEZ2ATLMXA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/special-load-washing-basket-kittens-saved-from-dump-as-spca-voices-desexing-plea/ZETAY2WUVREGJO53BEZ2ATLMXA/ Mitchell HagemanIt comes as more than 3000 cats remain in the SPCA's care this summer. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 01:44:08 +0000 A litter of kittens was about to be dumped by a Hawke's Bay river last week before the animals were taken to the SPCA in Napier. Photo / SPCA
